data.message: Nice promo but can I make a suggestion? I don't want to see a post every time a friend changes their profile pic. This is a real problem when you have friends changing their profile pic every day. Would appreciate the ability to turn this off. Thanks!

replies.message: Hi Evelyn. There are many ways you can control what you see in your News Feed, such as following or unfollowing friends and choosing to see fewer stories from a person, Page or group that you follow. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2fWQKvQ. -Jessica

Facebook Appreciate the quick reply but I have those features already on. I don't want to unfollow friends and changing the news feed doesn't work that well. I have friends on "See First"and I never see their posts first because they are BURIED in ads and profile pic changes. Just maybe you could consider giving us a way to turn it off. Maybe you could shrink those pics so they don't cover half my page.
When anybody smilein every one is with him when ever he is crying he found himself alone
